attributes.action: create a new Forces Day bank holiday to commemorate all the UK servicemen who have lost their lives or been seriously injured in war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the Government should create a new bank holiday to commemorate all the UK servicemen who have lost their lives or been seriously injured in war. After the death of 20 servicemen in Afghanistan recently and the death of the two World War 1 veterans, Henry Allingham and Harry Patch, such a bank holiday would allow society to pay their proper respects to individuals who have given up their lives fighting for this country.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
